title: Delve Fonts Launches New Website
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012110531im_/http:/typophile.com/files/delve_fonts_website_sm_4543.png)

For Immediate Release:  
Alameda, CA- February 3rd, 2010

Delve Fonts announces its new website has been launched. [http://www.delvefonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012110531/http:/www.delvefonts.com/) To celebrate, the [Delve Fonts Typeface Library is 50% off](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012110531/http:/www.delvefonts.com/specials.html) during the month of February. Additionally, the site now features online ordering with instant downloads.

Recent additions to the the collection include: [Rieven Uncial](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012110531/http:/www.delvefonts.com/rieven_uncial.html) by Steven Skaggs, recipient of a TDC² 2010 Certificate of Excellence in Type Design (available 4/10/10), [Quara](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012110531/http:/www.delvefonts.com/quara.html) by Delve Withrington, and [Cody](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012110531/http:/www.delvefonts.com/cody.html) by Cody Chancellor.

Select Delve Fonts are also now available for use on the Web via [Typekit](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012110531/http:/typekit.com/foundries/delve-fonts/).

Sign up to receive the Delve Fonts newsletter: [http://www.delvefonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012110531/http:/www.delvefonts.com/ "http://www.delvefonts.com")

Follow Delve Fonts on Twitter: [http://www.twitter.com/delvew](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012110531/http:/www.twitter.com/delvew "http://www.twitter.com/delvew")

Become a fan of Delve Fonts on Facebook: [http://www.facebook.com/delvefonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012110531/http:/www.facebook.com/delvefonts "http://www.facebook.com/delvefonts")

Delve Fonts is a full-service type foundry in Alameda, CA offering designers exclusive new typefaces and Type Services including: Custom Type Design, Fonts for Mobile Devices, and Foreign Language Fonts.

###
author: delve
